attributes.action: ensure that deaths like that of Baby P, reported 11.11.2008 and Victoria Climbie NEVER happenagain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr & Mrs Brown,

As parents, you must be devastated about the death of Baby P reported on the news today. When you look into your childrens eyes, can you even begin to imagine the torture that this poor baby must have suffered.  It would appear that nothing has been learned since the tragic death of Victoria Climbie.  Please, please, ensure that this NEVER happens again.  Heads must roll, the failures cannot be described as anything other than complete negligence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
